籤詩版本二:
For example, if the third, fourth and fifth day of the lunar month are missing
Half without, half with, not complete
Waiting for fifteen good midnight snacks
Everywhere is bright and everywhere is round
詩意: In this hexagram, the moon is missing but not full. Be patient in everything.
解曰: Stay conservative and wait. Like the first month of the month. Waiting for the round time. Nothing bad.
籤詩故事一:
◇Li Yuan ascended the throne
In the last years of the Sui Dynasty, Emperor Yang of the Sui Dynasty was corrupt and dissolute, having fun everywhere, causing resentment among the people and dividing the empire among the heroes.
In 618 AD, Yu Wenhuaji, Sima Dekan, Pei Qantong and others launched a mutiny to kill Emperor Yang of the Sui Dynasty and proclaimed Yang Hao as emperor.
Soon Yu Wenhuaji killed Qin Wanghao and proclaimed himself Emperor Xu, establishing the country Xu.
The following year, he was jointly destroyed by Tang general Li Shentong and Xia king Dou Jiande.
After the Central Plains region learned of the death of Emperor Yang, Luoyang guard Wang Shichong supported King Dong of Yue as emperor, that is, Emperor Ai of Sui Dynasty.
At this time, Li Yuan deposed Yang You, proclaimed himself emperor in Taiyuan, and changed the country's name to Tang. This is Tang Gaozu.
